channel.title: Whonix - Install Routine MariaDB 10.3.9 - Do not work on Whonix 14
channel.description:
https://downloads.mariadb.org/mariadb/repositories/#mirror=host-europe&distro=Debian&distro_release=stretch--stretch&version=10.3
> sudo apt-get install software-properties-common dirmngr > sudo apt-key adv --recv-keys --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com 0xF1656F24C74CD1D8 > sudo add-apt-repository 'deb [arch=amd64,i386,ppc64el] http://ftp.hosteurope.de/mirror/mariadb.org/repo/10.3/debian stretch main'
Only a full of Errors!
ef86

sudo add-apt-repository ‘deb [arch=amd64,i386,ppc64el] http://ftp.hosteurope.de/mirror/mariadb.org/repo/10.3/debian stretch main’
